front.title: CERNET deployment of IVI/MAP-T in an IPv6-only network

abstract.t: This document presents the China Education and Research Network (CERNET)'s IPv4 as a Service (IPv4aaS) design, deployment and operation experience. The techniques used are IPv4/IPv6 stateless translation both in the forms of single translation (IVI, for IPv6-only servers) and double translation (MAP-T, for dual-stack clients).
